title: Springfield XD, XDM, MOD2 IWB Leather in Waistband Concealed Carry Holster TAN
description: Custom leather inside the waist band IWB holster for the Springdfield XD, XDM, XD Mod2 with 3.8", 4" or 4.5" Barrel. Hand crafted from top quality leather to custom fit the Springdfield XD, XDM, XD Mod2. Comes with belt/waist band clip. Just tuck the holster into your waistband and you are ready to go. The back of the holster covers the top of the pistol slide so it does not dig into you for additional comfort that is not found in many other holsters. Azula Gun Holsters are hand made by master craftsman with over 30 years of holster making experience. Azula Gun Holsters have a lifetime replacement warranty and come with a fully coated steel clip. This is a RIGHT HANDED TAN leather holster. Model X
